website_summaries.verdict: Does a good job of restoring luster, but not as good a job covering scratches.
pros: Good amount of coverage with just one bottle
Protects the floors for several months
A good product to try if you want to delay refinishing
cons: Made for hardwoods only and will not work well on laminate, tile, or other hard surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Amazing on my 1890’s floorboards!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Have an 1890’s parlor room with dry ashy looking wood. Don’t have money to refinish so i thought I’d try this and it worked so well! It not only made the wood richer color but also a little shine plus made it smooth compared to the rough unfinished flooor that it was I’m the video i show the difference with rejuvenate compared to unfinished. Also at end of video i pour some out so you can see consistency of liquid and how it spreads. I simply spread with a rag on my hands and knees
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results
customer_reviews.text: Excellent results. I used Rejuvenate floor cleaner first and then applied two coats of this product. I am very pleased with the results on my 18 year old oak floors.
customer_reviews.author: sandra n sims

customer_reviews.title: Followed the directions and love the finish on our hardwoods
customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions and love the finish on our hardwoods. One key is to NOT vigorously shake the bottle before using as that agitates the restorer and produces small bubbles in the finish. Just lightly rock the bottle back and forth a couple of times before pouring on floor to apply with the microfiber bonnet. Our floors are 25+ years old and other than a few small spots that had chipped, the floor looks like it was just installed. I applied 2 coats and it really shines now!
customer_reviews.author: a2thdoc

customer_reviews.title: Great on our laminate floors, so far.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before realizing it's not for wood laminate. Hardwood only. But I decided to give it a shot. So far we are very happy with it. I cleaned with rejuvate floor cleaner, then applied this with our ocedar 2 sided microfiber dust mop (using the low pile/scrubber side). I will update if it peels or discolors. Pictures are after the cleaning, and 2 days after using restorer.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: It works great on giving a nice shiny look to the wood ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great on giving a nice shiny look to the wood floors for about 1-2 days then back to the dull unpolished look. For the money and work involved not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hurt

customer_reviews.title: not for all wood floors
customer_reviews.text: this is deceptive advertising. this cannot be used on all wood floors. only be used on unwaxed polyurethane finished wood floor only. by the time I realized this it was past the 30 day return policy. I contacted the supplier and asked for my money back. they refused.
customer_reviews.author: joanne williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this has been a great value! I have to add that it's only day 1 but you can see the difference between the shine and the untreated space in the pics! We have an area in our dining room that is having some issues with sun damage so we have removed the warped wood, resealed it, and then the puppy came along (ugh!). This was the perfect fix to keep her accidents out of the cracks of the wood joints and we noticed that the tiny nail scratches looked less prevalent after just one coat as well. I'll definitely find this product next time we need to seal floors again!
customer_reviews.author: Ctaylor143

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I bought this based off reviews and customer photos, but man what a joke! I used this on a test area of my hardwood floors and had better results with a vinegar/olive oil mixture!! Seriously this did nothing and I find that it was a total waste of my money. If you want shine, mix one part vinegar with one part olive oil and use that instead!!
customer_reviews.author: SpiritHorse11

customer_reviews.title: THIS is the best. It is an actual plastic
customer_reviews.text: I wish Lowes sold this instead of that crummy "bona" product. THIS is the best. It is an actual plastic ? I have NO idea but it seals and works and makes my floors look like they were just pro refinished. Lasts with shine. You will NOT regret this purchase. Easy to apply. Quick to dry. Just do yourself a favor and buy it.
customer_reviews.author: boo piggy

customer_reviews.title: So much easier than sanding and starting over
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by our realtor to make our 28-year-old wood floors look better when putting the house up for sale. I had my doubts that it would make much difference, and was worried that the result might look worse. I couldn’t have been more wrong. In a single day our foyer floor was looking like new. The results are a bit less spectacular in the more worn areas in our dining room, but still a major improvement. If I’d known about this product, I would have done it earlier.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gasaway

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution, very slippery floors.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shine, helped cover scratches to improve looks of the floor. But oh my goodness, makes the floor extremely slippery! Husband, dog and myself slipped. Dog went flying as she ran around the corner. Rugs wouldn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Henry

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just finished a room I rent out in my house yesterday. It looks great and was very easy to do. Unfortunately, the day before I put some Murphy's soap on the worn down hardwood before I bought this. The directions on this say you need to clean Murphy's soap off so I bought some of the No Bucket cleaner from Rejuvenate and cleaned the floor first. Let it dry for about 24 hours then put two coats of this on. Looks much better now and I'm not as worried about the floor getting wet. Plan to do my home office next. Very easy and inexpensive. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bon Jon Mo V

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Renter Moving Out
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd left nail marks in the surface of the wood floors at the house I was renting. (They weren't scratches in the actual wood.) This floor restorer made the floors nice and shiny AND I got my full security and pet deposits back!
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this product if you have a real wood floors
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst! I use this and then had to strip my floors ..this is a complete fail of a product! I do not recommend this on any wood floor real wood floor!!! Find something else to use but do not use this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy with this Product
customer_reviews.text: Rejuvenate Professional Wood Floor Restorer brought my old wood floors up so good. I never write reviews and this is my first, but i had to mention this item. I applied 3 coats and my floor came up amazing. Not prefect as my floors are about 40 plus years old. Very easy to use, no strong smell and applies evenly with no streaks. Would recommend to clean your floors really well before applying Rejuvenate Professional Wood Floor Restorer. Will buy again for the bedroom floor
customer_reviews.author: MMcC

customer_reviews.title: Good Product for Light Traffic Areas
customer_reviews.text: I really went for the "lasts two years" part of the ad. If you have dogs or children, it honestly last more like two months. It's applied thinly. I always get it a coating on my fingernails and that's gone in a couple days. I reapply at least every two months, but in a way it's worth it. It's not economically draining and while spills and traffic wear away the product, it does protect it. With three dogs, I'd hate to try and see what my floors would look like using ot only once every two years. It is a decent product that the layman and housewife can easily use with no fumes at all.
customer_reviews.author: an honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I took before and after pics!!!! My floors are 6 years old and look 30 years old unfortunately. I steam cleaned them and then spread this stuff all over as directed (to the best of my ability because I suck at cleaning) and they looked shiny and amazing. It's now about a month later and they still look great. My main level is about 1500 sq feet and has 3 10x12 area rugs down and a large island and I used less than a bottle. I will probably repeat this 2-3 times a year.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I thought there was no hope for my 14 year old hardwood floors but THEY LOOK FANTASTIC. Caps intentional-I can see my face in the floors, not necessarily a good thing but I love a clean shiny floor . This is your product! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My circa 1908 home has beautiful oak tongue in groove flooring. I’m not ready to reseal yet but I eS starting to notice a lot of light surface scratches as well as dullness so I decided to give this product a try. I only applied one coat and the floors look beautiful! I’ve received several compliments since I applied this product. I will definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I had only gotten one bottle which was enough for one coat on my new apartment's hardwood floor. All the nearby hardware store had was Bona, so I used that for a second coat and it dulled the shine of the first Rejuvenate coat! I ended up getting two more bottles of Rejuvenate and applying two more coats. Beautiful very noticeable shine and gleam to the floor, and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement.  Got rid of dog scratches and scuffs
customer_reviews.text: Helped get rid of all the scratches and wear from our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely brought my real wood floors back to life! My home was built in the 50s and it looks like the previous owners never cared for the floors properly. This was definitely an easy/cheap way to help my floors! I would definitely recommend. Follow the instructions and this can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Yesica

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I have 120 year old wood floors. I was in dispair with the splinters, marks, scuffs, but did not want to seal with a poly or use some kind of sealant, sanding was out of the wuestion - I like age to show. Unbelievable results with this restorer, I am in amazement. The wood just drank it, another coat and it all settled into this unbelievable lustrous wood, I can’t believe this is mine! Gorgeous wood floors! No more shoes in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great Rejuvenate wood wax and shine
customer_reviews.text: Such a Grest product! Takes off scratches off my pine floors, and made it have a shiny waxed coat on it. I sat the container on my bathroom counter, and a little dripped on counter, so a tiny part of counter looked waxed too. So be careful to sit something under it. Might need to wax in front of door again where dog leaves scratch marks, but has lasted a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Howard  B Scott

customer_reviews.title: Works fairly well
customer_reviews.text: The floors certainly look better after using this product. Maybe if I got down on my hands and knees and used a good florr wax and elbow grease it would be better, but ... life's too short!
customer_reviews.author: Jansail

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenate the shine on wooden floors.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised on our oak wooden floors. It’s a good product. It restores the shine on a good surface. If the surface is destroyed this won’t bring it back. That’s not it’s purpose. I will buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: F Fernald

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: HOLY MOLEY!!!!! Have used Bona for years and tried this because I didn’t see the shine I wanted. This stuff is absolutely AMAZING!! Tired old 20+ year old floors look brand new! Wish I had switched years ago!!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne1

customer_reviews.title: Makes old floors look new
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff for our hardwood floors. Sweep first, then vacuum then wash let dry and then wash again. Then just dump this on the hardwoods and smooth it all out. Let it dry and it gives you that crazy new floor shine. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: charlie warren

customer_reviews.title: Brought out the beauty of our floors
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd put a coat of polish down on our floors before we moved into our new house. This stuff turned out GREAT! The floors were in pretty good shape to begin with, but the polish gave the floors some extra shine and really brought out the rich colors of the wood. One bottle covered about 450 sq. feet with some left over. When the floors start looking a little tired in the future, I'll definitely be using this product again. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dann0

customer_reviews.title: Floors look new again
customer_reviews.text: After trying many wood floor cleaner/shiners, a friend told me about this product, it's easy to apply. After I vacuum and clean the floors I apply as directed and I get a beautiful shine that 'lasts' a long time. Love this product. The packaging was just a bag and was damaged the first time sent it back and they sent me a new one,the bag was ripped but the product was fine so I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: bflo

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Love it last longer then orange glow. alot more money but then I do not have to wax as offten with this product I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Brinker

customer_reviews.title: Hard Wood Would!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works pretty good, made damage part of my hardwood floor look good again after using a plastic mesh to remove shoe scuffs! ...Rejuvenate is AW'IGHT! ...Gratitude.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy Lee

customer_reviews.title: It made a huge difference and now it’s looks fantastic! No need to replace the wood and spend ...
customer_reviews.text: We have real wood in the front entrance and in the kitchen. It’s about 19 years old and thought we would have to replace. I researched on the web and found Rejuvenate and ordered. Wow!!! It made a huge difference and now it’s looks fantastic! No need to replace the wood and spend thousands of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Ung Yi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product. Your floors look like you had them professionally done. Make sure they are very clean. I’ve used this product for 4 years. It’s worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Dthomp

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to restore some of the heavy traffic areas on my hardwood floors. First of all my floors look worst now than they did before I used it, and second it burned the skin off my legs and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for the second time. First I tried it on my bedroom then the second one on ky living room. It really restores the shine of hard wood floors. All i needed to do was to mop amd clean my floor thoroughly. I did not sand. I used a dry swifter pada to apply this on my dloor
customer_reviews.author: isa08

customer_reviews.title: Dries Fast, Super Shiny ! Super !
customer_reviews.text: Wow, saved me hundreds of dollars, milk for the hardwood floors ! No need to strip the floor, clean and just add a thin layer and let the floor shine for months. Super Product ! Love it !
customer_reviews.author: MarkD

customer_reviews.title: Not what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I think this product has changed. I used it for years and this time it was thinner and although the shine was good at first after a week it started to wear off quickly. I used three coats. Please bring back the original.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Saved our floors. I know we'll have to use this every couple of months (3 kids under 4) but wow it made such a huge difference it looked like we got new floors. It's the only "cleaner" that every made our floors look shiny and new.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wean | thelittleweans

customer_reviews.title: Made my hard wood floor shiny again
customer_reviews.text: Really shined up my hardwood floors. My floors are 20 years old and have been well taken care of, but I know they will need refinished one day. But not this day! This product really helped them look great. Now, it won't fix the places where the sun has faded the wood, but those places are still shiny even if they are not exactly the same color as those places that were covered by a rug.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: After cleaning the floors really good and laying down two coats
customer_reviews.text: The product really delivered as indicated. We purchased an used townhouse with wood floors that had lots of scratches. After cleaning the floors really good and laying down two coats, you could not see most of the scratches unless you really looked. This will hold us over until we can afford to have the floor professionally refinished. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: BRobinson

customer_reviews.title: the results are very poor
customer_reviews.text: used it on polished wood block floor and the results are very poor.The information given by the seller is that it restores wood floors to a "high gloss.proffesional finish" the visable results in regards to gloss/shine are inferior to my existing block floor finish,All instructions were carried out as recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Polishes old scratched up wood floors like a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Still need to do a few more coats but so far , huge improvement. Last tenants destroyed the hardwood floors that were just redone 2 years ago. This stuff polished the floor right up and it looks new now. Will update when completely done
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Used on floors about 7 months ago
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Used on floors about 7 months ago. They are still as shinny as they were then. Would recommend. Used it on 80+ year old hardwood floors. Not too hard to use either.
customer_reviews.author: jeff jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I love this My old wood floors need sanding and restaining but this perks them up until I can get that done!! Best I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenate Professional Wood Floor Restorer and Polish
customer_reviews.text: If shiny is what the result needs to be, this is it.. Shiny. I used it on a wood clock case that needed some new look. This goes on easy, with a microfiber cloth. It dries fast and re-coats relatively fast. Made the clock look great.. Should do very well on wood floors.. Not much odor, either.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Rat

customer_reviews.title: Magic or a Miracle
customer_reviews.text: It turned my disgustingly old, worn-out, ugly wood floor into something that I really like now!
customer_reviews.author: Mojtaba Ejtehadian

customer_reviews.title: This product really did rejuvenate my floor
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with excellent results. My floor looks great! It went from tired looking to almost new.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C

customer_reviews.title: I have use the product for 6 years. Is super good.
customer_reviews.text: Are House have historical floors , but I love clean, shine and pristine floors. The product works fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: This did not help restore the shine of our hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed, this did not restore the shine of our hardwood floors. It was hard to apply but the worst thing is that it did not work
customer_reviews.author: Jean Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I buy nothing else but this one!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best floor restorer ever. Expensive, but worth the price. My floors look GREAT for about 5-6 mos after I put it down. Stinking dog even peed on the floor and I caught it maybe 6 hours later and floor was still shiny and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Reader

customer_reviews.title: Restores the Shine
customer_reviews.text: Rejuvenate did a great job restoring the luster to my kitchen floors! I did 2 coats. So easy to apply, just mop it on. The bottle claims it fills the scratches, it doesn’t, nor did I really expect it to, knock off one star for that. The hardest part of the whole process was keeping the dog and family out of there while it dried!
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: My favorite floor restorer gloss
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It made my old wood floors look bright and new but, it is a high gloss so if you miss a spot, it's noticable.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help to much in worn wood
customer_reviews.text: Used 2 bottles and it helped a lot in the good condition areas but the worn parts still are noticeably dull
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Like brand new
customer_reviews.text: The stuff is fabulous for hardwood flooring specially old hardwood flooring that basically makes it look brand new again I particularly like the high shine last for a long time highly recommended and beautiful on your floors
customer_reviews.author: Scampy1

customer_reviews.title: Within days it began to look worse and worse and is extremely difficult to remove
customer_reviews.text: Looked decent after applying. Had to apply multiple coats to look anywhere near even. Within days it began to look worse and worse and is extremely difficult to remove. We are having to scrub on our hands and knees to get it off. Will never use again.
customer_reviews.author: a jackson

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I had heard of Rejuvenate and because I was selling my house I decided to give it a try. Vacuum your floor, apply as it says and wow. Floor is clean and scratches are covered. It came out beautiful. I also have used it on scuff marks after application.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It streaked and left a buildup on floor. Did not like this product.
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far I liked this, Wotks well after I’ve cleaned the floors. Helps with the scratches
customer_reviews.author: Marlys

customer_reviews.title: Did not wear well.
customer_reviews.text: It was too shinny and showed any dust, dirt, scuff. It doesn't even look like it was polished and it is only about 2-3 weeks since we used it. Will not use it again.
customer_reviews.author: magenta

customer_reviews.title: Best Floor Shine I've Ever Tried
customer_reviews.text: Best floor shine I've tried. Local store caries this in regular but I ordered from Amazon to get the high gloss version. My entry looks better than it has in years, and I have one room with wood floor with all of my cat litter boxes. Floor was dull from the cats dragging litter on to it, mopped but made almost no difference. But when I used this there was a huge difference. Will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: NCScoundrel

customer_reviews.title: Try it, Rejuvenate is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I thought I needed to hire a professional to restore my oak floors. A friend told me about Rejuvenate and this stuff really works!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Turck

customer_reviews.title: Streaky Hardwood floors? Here’s the fix
customer_reviews.text: Murphy’s soap is great for cleaning and preserving the wood but after you’ve done that, this stuff applied correctly with a micro-fiber mop cover makes wood floors new. Really, and not crazy slippery either
customer_reviews.author: Big Mac

customer_reviews.title: MAKE YOUR FLOOR LIKE NEW AGAIN.
customer_reviews.text: Wow....huge difference if you've got a dull wood floor. This makes your floors look like new. Shiny and clean. Great product. So easy to use. So worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gerrie C. Pretzel

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff I have ever used on wood
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually review things, but this is seriously the best product I have ever used on wood floors and surfaces. I was dreading to re-varnish my wood floors and baseboards, because I can not handle the fumes. This saved me. It has little to no scent, and my floors look brand new. I was amazed. Very easy to apply as well. I will be using it on all my wood trim next.
customer_reviews.author: Hydrogen

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to me by a friend after I mentioned how dull my wood floors were. It was easy to use and I have no complaints. Make sure you use the correct mop and move your furniture before using. I forgot to take a before picture. This shine is after two applying coats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old flooring looks new!
customer_reviews.text: After trying numerous products on my wood flooring, I read about this product. The oak flooring was installed by my Dad in 1960! It has gone through many pets, children, and furniture being moved about. I tried those that promised to clean like new, restore to original luster, and on and on. But this one really brought back the shine and luster! I am amazed with just the first application. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. Goes on so easily, and after one app looks great, but after 2 its terrific. Waited 24 hrs between applications. Highly recommend. Hi shine, no slipping.
customer_reviews.author: deedee

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient floor wax, the floor will not slip after dragging, and the color of the floor has been greatly improved
customer_reviews.author: David chen

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: My floors don't look brand-new but they sure look better than before! I'm glad I took before and after pics because I can really see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Shiny floor again
customer_reviews.text: Great to use for heavy wear areas but make sure if you have bar stools that you use felt pads on the leg bottoms or it will easily scratch the product off
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kruck

customer_reviews.title: Before you spend hundreds of dollars having your old wood floors prof redone,try this Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product. Brought my 110 yr old wood floors back to almost New condition.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph r dorr

customer_reviews.title: Sham
customer_reviews.text: This product is a sham. Does not do what it said. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Norman Heflin

customer_reviews.title: My floors were not too bad to begin with (this won’t hide too many obvious ...
customer_reviews.text: Really works. My floors were not too bad to begin with (this won’t hide too many obvious imperfections or anything). This product made them really shine! Very pretty. It has been several months since the application and the floors still look good. I have mopped a few times too and they kept the shine.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shine
customer_reviews.text: Excellent job on my hardwood floors. I have been thinking about getting them redone for about a year or so and after applying this product I've changed my mind. It goes on easily and brings out a very nice shine. ABM
customer_reviews.author: ABM

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This works ok to clean doors but i haven’t noticed any particular restoration or shine. It works like any other floor cleaner. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jill881

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It cover up to 800sf. I did it twice. Looks like the hardwood floor is hunger for oil every 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great product - long lasting - durable!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well! Very impressed with the ease of use and the end product. Floors look 3-4x better than they did. The shine is excellent, even after a month of heavy traffic.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Martuscello

customer_reviews.title: A game changer for old hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: Only use this product on my old hardwood floors. Look great even though they have never been restored in a 100 year old home. I love love love this product
customer_reviews.author: Rugrat

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is really good for our wood floors. They look so much shinier and nice since using this.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L

customer_reviews.title: Amazed
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I was very skeptical but was amazed with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It did not do what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked this product. I was hoping that it would restore the color which became doll on the floor ,however, it did not do anything but polished a little after so many applications. So, I don't recommend this product to be bought.
customer_reviews.author: erdal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use on my wood floors. It was easy to apply and dried within the hour's time specified. Nice shine. Made the floors look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Palmacci

customer_reviews.title: durability
customer_reviews.text: Depending on how new your floors are one or two coats will make it shine , the only problem is any kinda water substance or anything you spill on it will easily leave a noticeable smear mark
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Blumenstein

customer_reviews.title: Not a Miracle product like it advertises
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t leave the shine it advertised. Just makes it clean.
customer_reviews.author: lyrah

customer_reviews.title: Makes floors shiny, but nothing else

product_meta.title: Rejuvenate Professional Wood Floor Restorer and Polish with Durable Finish Non-Toxic Easy Mop On Application High Gloss Finish 32oz
product_meta.description: Size:32 ozGet your glossy new wood floor look back in minutes with Rejuvenate Professional Wood Floor Restorer in the High Gloss finish. Rejuvenate your old wood floors with no sanding or professional refinishing needed. This long lasting, nontoxic floor polish is clear and will leave your hardwood floors with a high gloss finish in one easy, mop-on application. It restores years of wear and tear with a hard, durable, professional finish that lasts for years. The non-toxic, polyurethane-based formula also fills-in scratches & dents, eliminating the need for sanding. This mop-on product is simple to use and will transform your wood, hardwood and engineered wood floors in only one application. The wood floor polish is meant to be used on hardwood floors only. For flooring surfaces, other than wood - such as laminate, tile, stone, terracotta or terrazzo - please use our Rejuvenate All Floors Restorer. Reveal the Beauty of your hardwood floors and Make It New Again with Rejuvenate products. Best in class products. Made in the USA.
feature_bullets: Wood floor restoration and polishing formula fills in scratches, restores glossy shine and protects hardwood flooring
Bonds to existing finish to resist stains and spills with no waxy build up
Non-toxic pour on and mop application with our microfiber mop bonnet seals and protects wood floors for years

Perfect for all residential and commercial hardwood floor restoration and polishing projects. It’s not recommended to use Rejuvenate Professional Floor Restorer on laminate, tile, stone, vinyl or any other flooring surface
One bottle covers up to 525 sq. ft. and dries within 45 minutes | Proudly Made in America
